title: Vanadiel Watch Face
description: FFXI Vanadiel watch face for android wear - Shows current time and day in vanadiel as well as being a useful earthbound watch.Note: This will not create an icon on your phone, only on your watch :p-- FINAL FANTASY is a registered trademark of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd.FINAL FANTASY XI © 2002-2014 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved.Graphics used in accordance with the FINAL FANTASY® XI Materials Usage License - http://support.eu.square-enix.com/rule.php?id=20&la=1&tag=authc
descriptionHTML:
FFXI Vanadiel watch face for android wear - Shows current time and day in vanadiel as well as being a useful earthbound watch.

Note: This will not create an icon on your phone, only on your watch :p

--

FINAL FANTASY is a registered trademark of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd.

FINAL FANTASY XI © 2002-2014 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved.

Graphics used in accordance with the FINAL FANTASY® XI Materials Usage License - http://support.eu.square-enix.com/rule.php?id=20&la=1&tag=authc
comments: Works great, the vanadiel time is only off by a few seconds since this is a common issue with vanadiel timers after a couple of years that they need regular adjusting but other than that it's working as it should.
Sucks Nowhere to be found for usage plus I'm DEFINITELY sure it attacks viruses
